M

main(String[]) - Static method in class controller.ConferenceSystem
Runs the entire conference program by calling the run method in this class
Message - Class in entities
Represents a message which can be exchanged between Accounts in a Conversation.
Message(int, String, String, String, Integer) - Constructor for class entities.Message
Creates an instance of Message with an assigned ID, sender username, recipient username, content, and Message ID this instance is replying to.
Message(int, String, String, String) - Constructor for class entities.Message
Creates an instance of Message with an assigned ID, sender username, recipient username, and content.
messageAccount(String, String) - Method in class controller.MessageController
sends a message to account with specified username
messageAllAttendees(String) - Method in class controller.MessageController
sends a message to all registered attendees
messageAllSpeakers(String) - Method in class controller.MessageController
sends a message to all registered speakers
messageAttendee(String, String) - Method in class controller.MessageController
sends a message to attendee with specified username
messageAttendeesAtTalks(ArrayList<Integer>, String) - Method in class controller.MessageController
if the current user is a speaker, this method sends a given message to all attendees at selected talks the current user is giving
messageController - Variable in class controller.AccountController
 
MessageController - Class in controller
 
MessageController(String, AccountManager, ConversationManager, EventManager, SignupManager) - Constructor for class controller.MessageController
Manages generic messaging functionality for user with given username
messageSpeaker(String, String) - Method in class controller.MessageController
sends a message to speaker with specified username
messageToString(Integer) - Method in class use_cases.ConversationManager
Attempts to represent a Message of a given id as a String containing the sender and the content.
